scripts.test:integration: if ! docker info >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Docker is required for integration tests (Testcontainers).'; exit 1; fi; TESTCONTAINERS_RYUK_DISABLED=true bun test test/integration/session.unit.test.ts && TESTCONTAINERS_RYUK_DISABLED=true bun test test/integration/chat-session.unit.test.ts && TESTCONTAINERS_RYUK_DISABLED=true bun test test/integration/memory-queue-debounce.unit.test.ts
scripts.test:e2e: if ! docker info >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Docker is required for e2e tests.'; exit 1; fi; TESTCONTAINERS_RYUK_DISABLED=true bun test test/e2e --max-concurrency 1
scripts.test:all: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration && bun run test:e2e
